btn_support: Whip / Buy Me a Milk Tea
quick_start_content:
1. Download and install Wow from GitHub Releases.
2. Run 'wow' in your Wayland terminal.
3. Right click to set a static or dynamic wallpaper, or use the command:
   wow set wallpaper.jpg / video.mp4
4. More advanced usage: see the documentation.
support_desc: How would you like to motivate the author?
support_coffee: Buy a Milk Tea (12 RMB for update)
support_pay_whip: Please scan to pay 1 RMB to urge update. (Demo only)
support_pay_coffee: Please scan to pay 12 RMB for a milk tea. (Demo only)
